rules_text: Search your library for a Vampire or Bat card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
[i]“It's more than just cashing in favors my silly world hopping champion. Their survival relies on this as much as ours.”
—Fides, Kinnamon's Advisor to Sorin Markov.[/i]
notes:
https://www.deviantart.com/2wenty/art/Sanaq-The-Blood-Seeker-680074254

“I am writing you now to ask for your aid my siblings. The time to rise up is upon us. I pray your allegiance lays correctly in our upcoming battle.”
— Kinnamons Letter of Summons
